name: David Wayn
description: here is a little about me and what I have been told about myself…I love restaurant,camping, snuggling by a campfire & making love under the stars,or in the confines of a cost tent setting Either way,, its a very sensual way to spend a great weekend,my other interest include swimming, reading novels,writing poems,cooking, movies, riding, boating & fishing in the Gulf. I like the simple things in life.must important is being true to who you are & not being afraid to show it. I value Humanitarian works and charity and this is the reason why I have dedicated myself into here.I have a strong faith in God and would want someone with the same believe.Someone that can be a comfort to me & wouldn’t be afraid to learn from each-other for the same reason of life . Honesty is very important.
